line.comment: * on/off; with this setting factions can tell their defense fleets to properly focus on threats which don't officially claim sectors (like the OCV or Khaak Queens)
* wants to make peaceand will also offer it to the player
* 0= default ignore Terraformers ; 1=fear them and desire the global alliance ; 2=Galactic Protector ; 3= Tyrant
* how many freighters factions had before last cycle
* how many freighters factions lost during last cycle
* NPC workers pathing around enemy/blacklisted sectors
* conquering living space away from the OCV portal
* list of who declared war on player in the past
* faction table with the number of how many complains a faction has about player's boarding actions
* Terracorp's secret Xenon progress goals before they are willing to declare a global alliance
* hard difficulty gives OCV a starter invasion fleet
* update relations so that main empires don't care about neutral Traders
* E-War, Zero Hour changes to Hacking system
* ZH 1.7, advanced galaxy states, requires ZMap
* we don't need to reveal gate

sval.val: on/off; with this setting factions can tell their defense fleets to properly focus on threats which don't officially claim sectors (like the OCV or Khaak Queens)
wants to make peaceand will also offer it to the player
0= default ignore Terraformers ; 1=fear them and desire the global alliance ; 2=Galactic Protector ; 3= Tyrant
how many freighters factions had before last cycle
how many freighters factions lost during last cycle
NPC workers pathing around enemy/blacklisted sectors
conquering living space away from the OCV portal
list of who declared war on player in the past
faction table with the number of how many complains a faction has about player's boarding actions
Terracorp's secret Xenon progress goals before they are willing to declare a global alliance
hard difficulty gives OCV a starter invasion fleet
update relations so that main empires don't care about neutral Traders
E-War, Zero Hour changes to Hacking system
ZH 1.7, advanced galaxy states, requires ZMap
we don't need to reveal gate
